ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] ExtJS claims full REST support
ygData.msgSnippet: Dojo also supports PUT and DELETE as well as GET and POST: http://api.dojotoolkit.org/jsdoc/dojo/HEAD/dojo.xhr Don t know if it s recent or not.

http://api.dojotoolkit.org/jsdoc/dojo/HEAD/dojo.xhr

Don't know if it's recent or not.
